TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MembershipPasswordAttribute extends System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute

Docs.summary: Validates whether a password field meets the current password requirements for the membership provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError%2A> property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password contains fewer non-alphanumeric characters than specified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinPasswordLengthError { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MinPasswordLengthError : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinPasswordLengthError%2A> property contains either a literal, non-localized string or a resource key that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.
Docs.value: The minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinRequiredPasswordLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinRequiredPasswordLength : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.
Docs.value: The minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PasswordStrengthError { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PasswordStrengthError : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthError%2A> property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.
